remMethod.val: spons(允诺，约定)+or(表人)→允诺做某事的人→主办者

words.tran: 赞助；发起；保证人的地位；教父母身份

trans.tranOther: a person or company that pays for a show, broadcast, sports event etc, especially in exchange for the right to advertise at that event
to give money to a sports event, theatre, institution etc, especially in exchange for the right to advertise
